name: debug-run-issues
title: Debug Run Issues
description: Analyze and troubleshoot assistant run problems

arguments.name: run_status
arguments.description: Current run status (failed, cancelled, requires_action, etc.)

template: Debug issues with run {{run_id}}. Current status: {{run_status || 'unknown'}}. Issue description: {{issue_description}}. Analyze the run steps, check for errors, and provide troubleshooting recommendations.

examples.title: Debug stuck run
examples.description: Troubleshoot a run that appears to be stuck

arguments.issue_description: Run has been in progress for over 10 minutes without completing
